title: Majora's Mask
detail: Real life Majora's mask! It spins, attacks, lights up, and shoots things at you as you battle it!
extended_details:
We will dress up a Parrot drone with a shell to look like Majora's mask and add tentacles to it. 

At the very least, the mask will look pretty and follow you around, lighting up and making noises as its tentacles billow in the drones gust.

We will spend our own money on some parts.

Hopefully, we'll also accomplish the following:
The drone will autonomously target "Link" via his green hat using CV. Link will use his (sword XOR bow) AND shield to take on the mask. 
Link's weapons will have sensors to communicate his actions.
Link will wear a smart band on his arm that communicates with the mask, telling it when he attacks and telling him his HP.
The mask will have a variety of attack patterns, noises, and change colors as the battle goes on.
The mask will possibly have an onboard rubber band gun that fires via a servo motor at the player during attacks.
The mask will dodge and move when the player attacks.
